Action.author: mark.hadley
Action.body: I've been investigating this. Ports are getting being used by either other processes when this is occurring, or when the 'test' is run in succession. Haven't found a consistent reason, yet. Still looking into it.

Action.author: mark.hadley
Action.body: I was able to get the script to fail by running it 2 consecutive times. Added a property that allows for reusing of the addresses.

Action.author: mark.hadley
Action.body: Blocked b/c of new error in code. See INDY-339.

Action.author: danielhardman
Action.body: Mark, what commit or PR contains your fix?

Action.author: krw910
Action.body: The last build of indy-node shows this was run. It appears to be successful.
